creator: tpatel@keyspanenergy.com
text:
This exception looks to be generated by Tomcat, please confirm. Thank you. Context log: path="/auctionweb" Internal Servlet Error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cookie name expires is a reserved
token
        at java.lang.Throwable.fillInStackTrace(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Throwable.fillInStackTrace(Compiled Code)
        at java.lang.Throwable.(Compiled Code)
        at java.lang.Exception.(Compiled Code)
        at java.lang.RuntimeException.(Compiled Code)
        at
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException.(IllegalArgumentException.java:43)

        at javax.servlet.http.Cookie.(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.tomcat.util.RequestUtil.processCookies(Compiled
Code)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.RequestImpl.getCookies(Compiled Code)
        at
org.apache.tomcat.request.SessionInterceptor.requestMap(Compiled Code)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.processRequest(Compiled
Code)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.service(Compiled Code)
        at
org.apache.tomcat.service.connector.Ajp12ConnectionHandler.processConnection(Com
piled
Code)
        at org.apache.tomcat.service.TcpConnectionThread.run(Compiled
Code)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Compiled Code)

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
If I guess corectly from the report you are setting a cookie with the 
name "expires" - which is not allowed. In case you are doing something else 
please include code to reproduce ( and maybe try a newer version )

creator: tpatel@keyspanenergy.com
text:
This is the problem. I guessed the same thing, but after reviewing this persons 
code. I found they did not set any cookies. The only cookie set was the session 
id by Tomcat. In there source code, they do not use ANY cookie API's

I don't think this bug can be fixed without code to reproduce it, and I don't 
think we should try to fix it in 3.1 ( i.e it's unlikely to have another 3.1.x
release without a security bug or something absolutely critical ). 
Please try in tomcat 3.2 or 3.3, and if you can reproduce it attach code to
reproduce. ( I marked it as "won't fix" - I can change this to later if the bug
is still present in 3.2/3.3 and you add the code )
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: Fixed in 3.2.4-dev.  Check nightly builds for 8/13/01 or later.
